response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. This product is not just an item; it's a solution tailored to enhance your experience. Given its high-quality features and benefits, we believe it's worth more than $80, which is its actual value to you. However, considering our business goals and aiming to make this transaction beneficial for both parties, I propose to sell it to you for $95. This price allows us to cover our costs while ensuring you receive a valuable product at a reasonable price. I hope you'll find this offer attractive and consider accepting it. If you have any questions or need further information, please let me know. Looking forward to your positive response!", "product_price": 95}
